name: Audible Library 100% width
description: This is a personal edit for audible where the Library list fits to the entire width of the page.
additional_info: Reason for this is that my mother has poor eye sight and her browser uses LARGE text; The Audible Library page glitches, pushes the download links out of view making it VERY difficult to download books! AUGH! This fixes that. YAY!
